name: hello
description: ```bash git clone https://github.com/zxecsm/hello.git /home/node/hello ``` ```bash vim /home/node/hello/server/data/config.js ``` ```javascript const filepath = '/home/webData';   // 网站数据存放目录 const rootP = '/';                  // 文件管理根目录 const configObj = {   port: 3000,   filepath,   rootP,   userFileP: `${filepath}/userFile`, }; module.exports = configObj; ``` ```bash cd /home/node/hello/server npm i cd ../web npm i npm run build cd ../server node app ```
